title: KEEL Pro 极寒耐力测试：在0°C低温下进行全载荷挑战！
title_en: KEEL Pro Endurance Test in Cold Winter: Full Payload Challenge at 0°C Low Temperature!

frame.txt: 一段文字一段文字一段文字一段文字
frame.txt_en: The KEEL Pro performed exceptionally well in the winter test!

frame.txt: 一段文字一段文字一段文字一段文字
frame.txt_en: Winter flight is not only a challenge of cold weather, but also a rigoroustest of the stability and endurance of drones! We conducted a hovering endurance test of the KEEL Pro with a full payload of 50 kg in the outdoor temperature of 0°C in the north to see if it can still maintain its strong performance in the cold!

frame.txt: 一段文字一段文字一段文字一段文字
一段文字一段文字一段文字一段文字
frame.txt_en: The cold resistance of the battery is outstanding

frame.txt: 一段文字一段文字一段文字一段文字
frame.txt_en: At low temperatures, the drone’s battery is key. KEEL Pro uses the most cutting-edge high energy rate battery, 18S 84Ah large capacity, compared to previous tests, the battery life increased by 35%, in line with research and development expectations, the test battery also maintained good working condition.

widget.txt: 这块电池简直堪称行业典范！它不仅续航能力惊人，长时间使用不断电，而且充电迅速，性能稳定，时刻为设备提供可靠能源保障。
widget.txt_en: This battery is simply a model in the industry! It not only has amazing battery life, lasting for a long time without powering off, but also charges quickly and has stable performance, providing reliable energy support for devices at all times.

widget.txt: 这块电池简直堪称行业典范！它不仅续航能力惊人，长时间使用不断电，而且充电迅速，性能稳定，时刻为设备提供可靠能源保障。
